title: Temporal Anomaly Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of unusual time phenomena in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each temporal anomaly (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

time_loop.description: Event or period that repeats cyclically with participants experiencing the same sequence repeatedly.

temporal_displacement.description: Elements (people, objects, information) shifted from their original time period to another.

time_dilation.description: Differential flow of time where duration experiences vary between observers (slower/faster).

alternate_timeline.description: Events occurring in or creating a different version of history that branches from the primary timeline.

paradox.description: Logical contradiction in temporal events, such as causality loops or grandfather paradoxes.

convergence.description: Multiple timelines or possibilities collapsing into a single outcome or reality.

temporal_echo.description: Residual impressions of past or future events manifesting as ghost-like phenomena.

causality_violation.description: Effects preceding their causes or other fundamental disruptions to cause-and-effect relationships.

time_fragmentation.description: Reality splitting into disconnected temporal shards with different rules or progressions.

temporal_lock.description: Area or event fixed outside normal time flow, remaining unchangeable or inaccessible.

time_acceleration.description: Rapid advancement of temporal processes, causing accelerated aging, development, or evolution.

time_reversal.description: Events occurring in backward sequence or systems running in reverse temporal direction.

quantum_uncertainty.description: Multiple temporal states existing simultaneously until observed or resolved.

historic_divergence.description: Point where timeline splits into multiple possible futures or where alternate histories branch.

synchronicity_event.description: Meaningful temporal coincidences that connect otherwise unrelated events or entities.

timeline_collapse.description: Disintegration of ordered temporal progression, causing chaotic overlapping of past, present, and future.

temporal_overlay.description: Multiple time periods coexisting in the same space simultaneously.
